hooks.command: bash -c '[[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]] && command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && ruff format "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || true'

bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE "\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$" && (command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1 && prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 || npx --no-install prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1) || true'
bash -c 'command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && ruff check . --fix 2>&1 | head -20 || true'
bash -c 'command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f Cargo.toml ]] && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty 2>&1 | head -20 || true'
bash -c 'command -v golangci-lint >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f go.mod ]] && golangci-lint run --fix 2>&1 | head -20 || true'
bash -c 'command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f package.json ]] && eslint . --fix 2>&1 | head -20 || true'

bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qiE "(\.env($|\.)|\.pem$|\.key$|secrets/|credentials|token\.json$|id_rsa)" && echo "{\"decision\": \"block\", \"reason\": \"민감 파일 수정 차단: $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH\"}" && exit 2 || true'

bash -c 'CMD="$CLAUDE_BASH_COMMAND"; echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "(rm\s+-rf\s+/|sudo\s|chmod\s+777|mkfs|:(){ :|:& };:)" && echo "{\"decision\": \"block\", \"reason\": \"위험 명령 차단: $CMD\"}" && exit 2 || true'
